title: Fibonacci Number Checker (Medium)
description: Given an integer `n`, determine if it is a Fibonacci number. A number 'X' is considered to be a Fibonacci number if there exists some positive integers m and n such that X = Fm + fn, where F0 = 0, F1 = 1 and for n > 1, Fn = F(n-1) + F(n-2).n#### Function Signature```pythonndef is_fibonacci_number(n: int) -> bool:\``n#### Input- `n` (int): A non-negative integer.#### Output- Returns `True` if the input number is a Fiboncuan, `False` otherwise.
